participant_1.background:
I was looking for a new challenge and opportunity to grow in my career.
my mother is a teacher.
my favorite thing to do is to read books on the beach.
i was accepted to participate.
I enjoy writing my dreams down because they often tell me a lot about myself.

participant_2.background:
I play music to cheer myself up.
i am stuck in a wheel chair.
i live with a roommate.
i love to listen to music.
I was saddened by the death of my favorite horse, but I am grateful for the many years of companionship we shared.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hey! I am doing well, thank you for asking. I am a little sad because my favorite horse died recently, but I am grateful for the many years of companionship we shared.
Oh no, I am so sorry to hear that. I know how much you loved your horse. I am sure he is in a better place now.
Thank you for your kind words. I am trying to stay positive.
That's great. I am sure you will get through this. Do you have any other hobbies that you enjoy?
I love to listen to music and play music. It cheers me up.
That's great! I enjoy listening to music too. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially love country music.
I love country music too! I have been to a lot of country concerts.
That's awesome! I have always wanted to go to a country concert.
You should! They are so much fun.
I will definitely have to go to one soon.
Great! I hope you have a great time.
